verses.verse: <WG1161> I commend <WG4921> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213> Phebe <WG5402> our <WG2257> sister <WG79>, which is <WG5607> <WG5752> a servant <WG1249> of the Congregation <WG1577> which <WG3588> is at <WG1722> Cenchrea <WG2747>:

That <WG2443> ye receive <WG4327> <WG5667> her <WG846> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>, as becometh <WG516> saints <WG40>, and <WG2532> that ye assist <WG3936> <WG5632> her <WG846> in <WG1722> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG302> business <WG4229> she hath need <WG5535> <WG5725> of you <WG5216>: for <WG1063> she <WG3778> <WG5625> <WG846> hath been <WG1096> <WG5675> a succourer <WG4368> of many <WG4183>, and <WG2532> of myself <WG846> <WG1700> also <WG2532>.
Greet <WG782> <WG5663> Priscilla <WG4252> and <WG2532> Aquila <WG207> my <WG3450> helpers <WG4904> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>:

Who <WG3748> have <WG5294> for <WG5228> my <WG3450> life <WG5590> laid down <WG5294> <WG5656> their own <WG1438> necks <WG5137>: unto whom <WG3739> not <WG3756> only <WG3441> I <WG1473> give thanks <WG2168> <WG5719>, but <WG235> also <WG2532> all <WG3956> the Congregations <WG1577> of the goyim <WG1484>.

Likewise <WG2532> greet the Congregation <WG1577> that is in <WG2596> their <WG846> house <WG3624>. Salute <WG782> <WG5663> my <WG3450> wellbeloved <WG27> Epaenetus <WG1866>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the firstfruits <WG536> of Achaia <WG882> unto <WG1519> Moshiach <WG5547>.
Greet <WG782> <WG5663> Miryam <WG3137>, who <WG3748> bestowed <WG2872> much <WG4183> labour <WG2872> <WG5656> on <WG1519> us <WG2248>.

Salute <WG782> <WG5663> Andronicus <WG408> and <WG2532> Junia <WG2458>, my <WG3450> kinsmen <WG4773>, and <WG2532> my <WG3450> fellowprisoners <WG4869>, who <WG3748> are <WG1526> <WG5748> of note <WG1978> among <WG1722> the emissarys <WG652>, who <WG3739> also <WG2532> were <WG1096> <WG5754> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> before <WG4253> me <WG1700>.
Greet <WG782> <WG5663> Amplias <WG291> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>.
Salute <WG782> <WG5663> Urbane <WG3773>, our <WG2257> helper <WG4904> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547>, and <WG2532> Stachys <WG4720> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27>.
Salute <WG782> <WG5663> Apelles <WG559> approved <WG1384> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547>. Salute <WG782> <WG5663> them <WG3588> which are of <WG1537> Aristobulus <WG711>' household.

Salute <WG782> <WG5663> Herodion <WG2267> my <WG3450> kinsman <WG4773>. Greet <WG782> <WG5663> them <WG3588> that be of <WG1537> the household of Narcissus <WG3488>, which <WG3588> are <WG5607> <WG5752> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>.

Salute <WG782> <WG5663> Tryphena <WG5170> and <WG2532> Tryphosa <WG5173>, who labour <WG2872> <WG5723> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>. Salute <WG782> <WG5663> the beloved <WG27> Persis <WG4069>, which <WG3748> laboured <WG2872> <WG5656> much <WG4183> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>.
Salute <WG782> <WG5663> Rufus <WG4504> chosen <WG1588> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> mother <WG3384> and <WG2532> mine <WG1700>.
Salute <WG782> <WG5663> Asyncritus <WG799>, Phlegon <WG5393>, Hermas <WG2057>, Patrobas <WG3969>, Hermes <WG2060>, and <WG2532> the brethren <WG80> which are with <WG4862> them <WG846>.

Salute <WG782> <WG5663> Philologus <WG5378>, and <WG2532> Julia <WG2456>, Nereus <WG3517>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> sister <WG79>, and <WG2532> Olympas <WG3652>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the saints <WG40> which are with <WG4862> them <WG846>.
Salute <WG782> <WG5663> one another <WG240> with <WG1722> an holy <WG40> kiss <WG5370>. The Congregations <WG1577> of Moshiach <WG5547> salute <WG782> <WG5736> you <WG5209>.

Now <WG1161> I beseech <WG3870> <WG5719> you <WG5209>, brethren <WG80>, mark <WG4648> <WG5721> them which cause <WG4160> <WG5723> divisions <WG1370> and <WG2532> offences <WG4625> contrary <WG3844> to the doctrine <WG1322> which <WG3739> ye <WG5210> have learned <WG3129> <WG5627>; and <WG2532> avoid <WG1578> <WG5657> them <WG575> <WG846>.

For <WG1063> they that are such <WG5108> serve <WG1398> <WG5719> not <WG3756> our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, but <WG235> their own <WG1438> belly <WG2836>; and <WG2532> by <WG1223> good words <WG5542> and <WG2532> fair speeches <WG2129> deceive <WG1818> <WG5719> the hearts <WG2588> of the simple <WG172>.

For <WG1063> your <WG5216> `Ovedience <WG5218> is come abroad <WG864> <WG5633> unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> men. I am glad <WG5463> <WG5719> therefore <WG3767> on <WG1909> your <WG5213> behalf <WG1909>: but yet <WG1161> I would have <WG2309> <WG5719> you <WG5209> wise <WG4680> unto <WG1519> that which is <WG1511> <WG5750> good <WG3303> <WG18>, and <WG1161> simple <WG185> concerning <WG1519> evil <WG2556>.

And <WG1161> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of peace <WG1515> shall bruise <WG4937> <WG5692> Satan <WG4567> under <WG5259> your <WG5216> feet <WG4228> shortly <WG1722> <WG5034>. The grace <WG5485> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216>. Amen <WG281>.

Timotheus <WG5095> my <WG3450> workfellow <WG4904>, and <WG2532> Lucius <WG3066>, and <WG2532> Jason <WG2394>, and <WG2532> Sosipater <WG4989>, my <WG3450> kinsmen <WG4773>, salute <WG782> <WG5736> you <WG5209>.
I <WG1473> Tertius <WG5060>, who wrote <WG1125> <WG5660> this epistle <WG1992>, salute <WG782> <WG5736> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>.

Gaius <WG1050> mine <WG3450> host <WG3581>, and <WG2532> of the whole <WG3650> Congregation <WG1577>, saluteth <WG782> <WG5736> you <WG5209>. Erastus <WG2037> the chamberlain <WG3623> of the city <WG4172> saluteth <WG782> <WG5736> you <WG5209>, and <WG2532> Quartus <WG2890> a brother <WG80>.
The grace <WG5485> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216> all <WG3956>. Amen <WG281>.

Now <WG1161> to him that is of power <WG1410> <WG5740> to stablish <WG4741> <WG5658> you <WG5209> according <WG2596> to my <WG3450> gospel <WG2098>, and <WG2532> the preaching <WG2782> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, according <WG2596> to the revelation <WG602> of the mystery <WG3466>, which was kept secret <WG4601> <WG5772> since the world began <WG5550> <WG166>,

But <WG1161> now <WG3568> is made manifest <WG5319> <WG5685>, and <WG5037> by <WG1223> the scriptures <WG1124> of the prophets <WG4397>, according <WG2596> to the Mitzvah <WG2003> of the everlasting <WG166> 'Elohim <WG2316>, made known <WG1107> <WG5685> to <WG1519> all <WG3956> nations <WG1484> for <WG1519> the `Ovedience <WG5218> of faith <WG4102>:

To 'Elohim <WG2316> only <WG3441> wise <WG4680>, be glory <WG1391> through <WG1223> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>. Amen <WG281>. Written <WG1125> <WG5648> to <WG4314> the Romans <WG4514> from <WG575> Corinthus <WG2882>, and sent by <WG1223> Phebe <WG5402> servant <WG1249> of the Congregation <WG1577> at <WG1722> Cenchrea <WG2747>.
